name: Mr. Guman Singh Kunwar
bio: Mr. Kunwar is a visionary leader with over 20 years of experience in public service and community development. He is dedicated to ensuring equitable water access.

name: Mrs. Anisha Paudel
bio: Mrs. Paudel brings a strong background in environmental sustainability and community engagement. She advocates for modern and eco-friendly water management practices.

name: Mr. Hari Prasad Pandey
bio: Mr. Pandey, with his meticulous approach, manages the operational aspects and administrative functions, ensuring smooth day-to-day activities of the Sansthan.

name: Ms. Krishna Prasad Gyawali
bio: Mr. Gyawali oversees the financial health and transparency of the organization, committed to responsible resource allocation and accountability.
